description.betterend.amber_gem: Amber Gems are obtained by crafting four Raw Amber, which can only be obtained from Amber Ore in the Amber Land biome. They are used in infusion rituals and to craft eyes of ender.
description.betterend.crystal_shards: Large single pillars of Aurora Blocks can be found while exploring in any biome, but are extremely common in the Crystal Mountains biome. They are used in infusion rituals, to make eyes of ender, and are a key component of eternal crystals.
description.betterend.raw_amber: Raw Amber is obtained by mining Amber Ore in the Amber Land biome. It is used to craft Amber Gems and is a key component of eternal crystals.
description.betterend.ender_dust: End dust can be made by placing an ender pearl and a netherite or aeternium smith hammer in an anvil. It can also be made by placing an ender shard and any type of smith hammer in an anvil. It is used to craft terminite and to make a potion of end veil.
description.betterend.eternal_crystal: Eternal crystals are crafted by an infusion ritual, using an End Crystal, four ender shards and four crystal shards.
description.betterend.ender_shard: Ender shards are obtained from ender ore. They are used in infusion rituals and are a key component in eternal crystals. They can also be crafted into end dust.
description.betterend.amber_root_seed: Amber root seed is an item that is used to grow raw amber root. It is dropped when harvesting raw amber roots and can only be placed on amber moss.
description.betterend.amber_root_raw: This plant grows in the Amber Land biome. It can be eaten or crafted into sugar.
description.betterend.shadow_berry: Shadow berry seeds are an item that are used to plant shadow berries. They can be crafted from a shadow berry (uncooked) and drop when shadow berries are harvested. They can only be planted on shadow grass.
description.betterend.shadow_berry_cooke: Cooked shadow berries are made by placing a shadow berry in a furnace, smoker, or on a campfire. They can be eaten or crafted into shadow berry jelly.
description.betterend.shadow_berry_jelly: Shadow berry jelly is crafted using a cooked shadow berry, sugar, gelatine, and either a water bottle or water bucket. It can be eaten and gives the player 20 seconds of night vision.
description.betterend.shadow_berry_raw: The shadow berry is found in the Shadow Forest biome. It can be eaten, crafted into cave pumpkin pie, or cooked.
description.betterend.blossom_berry: Blossom berries are found in the Blossoming Spires biome. They can be eaten or crafted into cave pumpkin pie or blossom berry jelly.
description.betterend.blossom_berry_jell: Blossom berry jelly is a food item that is crafted using a blossom berry, sugar, gelatine, and either a water bottle or water bucket.
description.betterend.sweet_berry_jelly: Sweet berry jelly is a food item that is crafted using a sweet berry, sugar, gelatine, and either a water bottle or water bucket.
description.betterend.chorus_mushroom_se: Chorus mushroom seeds are an item that is used to plant chorus mushrooms. They are dropped when harvesting chorus mushrooms and can only be planted on chorus nylium.
description.betterend.chorus_mushroom: A raw chorus mushroom is a food item that is found in the Chorus Forest biome. It can be cooked using a furnace, smoker, or campfire to create a cooked chorus mushroom.
description.betterend.chorus_mushroom_co: A cooked chorus mushroom is a food item made by cooking a raw chorus mushroom using a furnace, smoker, or campfire.
description.betterend.bolux_mushroom: A bolux mushroom is a plant found only in the Lantern Woods biome. They give off a slight glow and can only be placed on Rusticus. The bolux mushroom can be cooked using a furnace, smoker, or campfire to create a cooked bolux mushroom.
description.betterend.bolux_mushroom_coo: A cooked bolux mushroom is a food item made by cooking a bolux mushroom using a furnace, smoker, or campfire.
description.betterend.cave_pumpkin_pie: Cave pumpkin pie is a food item made using a cave pumpkin, sugar, and either shadow berries (uncooked) or blossom berries.
description.betterend.cave_pumpkin_seed: A cave pumpkin seed is an item that is used to grow a cave pumpkin. They can be crafted from a cave pumpkin.
description.betterend.umbrella_cluster_j: Umbrella cluster juice is a food item made by right-clicking an umbrella cluster while holding an empty glass bottle.
description.betterend.gelatine: Gelatine can be obtained by killing a cubozoa. It can be used to craft shadow berry jelly, blossom berry jelly, and sweet berry jelly.
description.betterend.bucket_cubozoa: A bucket of cubozoa is a version of a water bucket with a cubozoa inside. It is obtained by right-clicking a cubozoa while holding a water bucket.
description.betterend.bucket_end_fish: A bucket of end fish is a version of a water bucket with an end fish inside. It is obtained by right-clicking an end fish while holding a water bucket.
description.betterend.end_fish_raw: And end fish is a food item that can be obtained by killing an end fish. It can be cooked to make a cooked end fish using a furnace, smoker, or campfire.
description.betterend.end_fish_cooked: A cooked end fish is a food item that is made by cooking an end fish using a furnace, smoker, or campfire.
description.betterend.spawn_egg_end_fish: A spawn egg for an end fish. It can be used to spawn an end fish.
description.betterend.spawn_egg_cubozoa: A spawn egg for a cubozoa. It can be used to spawn a cubozoa.
description.betterend.end_lily_seed: A seed used to grow end lilies. It can only be planted underwater on end dust or end stone (as long as the end stone only has 1 block of water above it).
description.betterend.end_lily_leaf: An end lily leaf is obtained by breaking an end lily. The leaf can be smelted in a furnace to create a dried end lily leaf.
description.betterend.end_lily_leaf_drie: A dried end lily leaf is obtained by smelting an end lily leaf. It can be used to craft paper.
description.betterend.leather_stripe: A leather stripe is can be crafted from leather. Three leather stripes can be crafted into one leather or used to craft a leather wrapped stick.
description.betterend.leather_wrapped_st: A leather wrapped stick is used to make aeternium tools. It is crafted using a stick and a leather stripe.
description.betterend.silk_fiber: Silk fiber can be obtained by killing a silk moth or by shearing a silk moth hive or nest. It can be used to craft string.
description.betterend.crystalline_sulfur: Sulfur is found in the Sulfur Springs biome and is obtained by mining sulfur crystals. They can be used to craft gunpowder with bone meal and either coal or charcoal.
description.betterend.bulb_vine_seed: The bulb vine seed is used to grow bulb vines. They are obtained by breaking a bulb vine and can be planted on the underside of most blocks, including leaves.
